messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Activist claimed that somehow President Trump s tax returns are linked to missing black girls in the U.S.
False
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The left is desperate to end his candidacy before it even begins. Michigan Senator Debbie Stabenow has been fundraising off of the possibility of a Kid Rock candidacy.
False
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Six trucks full of 60,000 pillows from MyPillow will soon be heading to shelters and rescue organizations in the Houston area.Founder Mike Lindell says he and his employees just want to help any way they can.
False
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Two NYC-based artists secretly slipped some items inside the merchandising outpost of the Trump Tower s lower lobby. Among them: A Trump-emblazoned KKK hood for fine people.
False
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Sanders said the focus now was on doing everything that could be done to protect the people of Houston. Sanders did not mention Trump s visit, which will not include Houston due to the ongoing conditions there.
False
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
A CNN reporter is caught on camera trying to interview a stranded woman with her children. Jim Acosta is oblivious to the fact that this woman and her kids need help STAT!
False

Paul Goodloe was covering Hurricane Harvey for The Weather Channel when he spotted a downed American flag. What he did next was fantastic! Not only did he pull the flag out of the water but he folded the flag properly.
False
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Casey Stegall was reporting live in Galveston, Texas, during Hurricane Harvey. A woman handed him a six-pack of beer. He thanked the woman, who ran off.
False

Former Democratic National Committee chairman Howard Dean hinted that President Donald Trump would not make it through his first term. Dean suggested Trump could no longer be president by then anyway.
False

Vanderbilt professor Carol Swain brilliantly lays out the truth about the Democrat Party and how they have fought for decades to keep blacks down in America. Swain asks why the media never mentions that the Democrats are the party responsible for slavery.
False

Bishop James Dukes wants the parks in Chicago s south side to be renamed for famous black leaders. The opposition is coming from blacks who know the whole statue outrage is a hoax. This is a way to stop talking about black folks not working.
False

Clapper bashed President Trump during a discussion on national security and the Trump/Russia fake scandal. He followed the latest leftist line that Trump isn't fit to serve.

Building the structure has been a top priority for the president, who placed a strong emphasis on the proposal during the course of the campaign. The funding was included as a part of a minibus, which packaged together four appropriations bills.
